text: King for a Day is a song by American rock band Pierce the Veil. They are from San Diego. This song is from Pierce the Veil's Collide with the Sky. King for a Day was released on June 5, 2012. This song includes lead singer, Kellin Quinn, from the Sleeping with Sirens, another rock band. == References == Category:2012 songs Category:Rock songs
title: King for a Day
